CHUD.unsavedChangesHint: The conversation contains unsaved changes. Do you wish to save them?

CHUD.errors.failedToParse: Failed to parse sheet data. Are you sure this is a valid conversation sheet?
CHUD.errors.activateNoPages: Tried to activate a conversation with a document containing no pages.
